name: Danse Macabre (Silver Bunny Games)
description:
Play as a spy couple entwined in dance-

Instructions:

Use left-click to shoot

Use right-click to melee (appears opposite to way facing)

Melee is able to kill enemies as well as deflect bullets

Survive until the timer runs out!

Made for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam based on the theme "Linked Together"

!! I intend to continue working on this project, especially to implement the features I wanted to make in time for the jam but did not have time for. My intention for this project was to create a sort of "dance" in gameplay, alternating between melee and shooting. It's a little barely functioning right now, but it works almost as intended. If you do enjoy this version, please let me know and I'll release updates on the game as I make it, otherwise I'll just post it here on Itch when I'm happy with it. The first changes I'll make are: 

Enemy bullet-firing will happen after a clear windup time punctuated by a red line on the floor, instead of happening instantly. Additionally, you were supposed to have limited ammo before needing to reload, and bullet deflection was supposed to home-in to a degree on the enemy who fired it.
